get.description: Get information about the system

List all ingested Batches

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:batches:list`

parameters.description: UUID of the Batch uploader
parameters.name: uploader_uuid

parameters.description: Limit number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Offset from the beginning of the found set
parameters.name: offset

post.description:
Ingest a Batch from a SIP Source

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:batches:create`

get.description:
Show Batch by UUID

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:batches:read`

parameters.description: Identifier of Batch to show
parameters.name: uuid

get.description: Obtain access to the /monitor WebSocket

List the objects in a SIP source

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sipsources:objects:list`

parameters.description: Limit the number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Cursor token to get subsequent pages
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.description: SIP source identifier -- CURRENTLY NOT USED
parameters.name: uuid

get.description:
List all ingested SIPs

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sips:list`

parameters.description: Identifier of AIP
parameters.name: aip_uuid

parameters.description: UUID of the SIP uploader
parameters.name: uploader_uuid

parameters.description: UUID of the related Batch
parameters.name: batch_uuid

parameters.description: Limit number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Offset from the beginning of the found set
parameters.name: offset

post.description:
Ingest a SIP from a SIP Source

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sips:create`

parameters.description: Identifier of SIP source -- CURRENTLY NOT USED
parameters.name: source_id

parameters.description: Key of the item to ingest
parameters.name: key

post.description:
Upload a SIP to trigger an ingest workflow

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sips:upload`

parameters.description: Content-Type header, must define value for multipart boundary.
parameters.name: Content-Type

get.description:
Show SIP by ID

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sips:read`

parameters.description: Identifier of SIP to show
parameters.name: uuid

post.description:
Signal the SIP has been reviewed and accepted

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sips:review`

parameters.description: Identifier of SIP to look up
parameters.name: uuid

get.description: Download the failed package related to a SIP. It will be the original SIP or the transformed PIP, based on the SIP's `failed_as` value.

parameters.description: Identifier of the SIP to download
parameters.name: uuid

post.description:
Request access to SIP download

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sips:download`

parameters.description: Identifier of the SIP to download
parameters.name: uuid

post.description:
Signal the SIP has been reviewed and rejected

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sips:review`

parameters.description: Identifier of SIP to look up
parameters.name: uuid

get.description:
List all workflows for a SIP

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:sips:workflows:list`

parameters.description: Identifier of SIP to look up
parameters.name: uuid

get.description:
List all users

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `ingest:users:list`

parameters.description: Email of the user
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Name of the user
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Limit number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Offset from the beginning of the found set
parameters.name: offset
